```{r}
p3 <- df[df$Built == "3.5.1",]

for (x in 1:nrow(p3)) {
  pkg <- p3[x, "Package"]
  n <- sum(df$Package == pkg)
  
  if (n == 1) {
      tryCatch({
        install.packages(p3[x, "Package"])
      }, error = function(e){print(
        paste(p3[x, "Package"], e)
      )})
  } else {
      tryCatch({
        remove.packages(p3[x, "Package"], lib=p3[x, "LibPath"])
      }, error = function(e){print(paste(
        'removed',
        p3[x, "Package"]
      ))})
  }
}
  
```
